mil6.3.11:1.2_0: ‘nibbānaṁ na atītaṁ, na anāgataṁ, na paccuppannaṁ, na uppannaṁ na anuppannaṁ na uppādanīyan’ti.
mil6.3.11:1.4_3: na uppādetvā sacchikaroti, api ca, mahārāja,
mil6.3.11:2.1_3: vivaṭaṁ pākaṭaṁ katvā dīpehi chandajāto ussāhajāto,
mil6.3.11:2.2_2: taṁ sammāpaṭipanno jinānusiṭṭhiyā saṅkhāre sammasanto paññāya sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.11:2.3_0: Yathā, mahārāja, antevāsiko ācariyānusiṭṭhiyā vijjaṁ paññāya sacchikaroti;
mil6.3.11:2.4_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, sammāpaṭipanno jinānusiṭṭhiyā paññāya nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.11:3.2_0: Anītito nirupaddavato abhayato khemato santato sukhato sātato paṇītato sucito sītalato daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil6.3.11:4.1_1: puriso bahukaṭṭhapuñjena jalitakaṭṭhitena agginā dayhamāno vāyāmena tato muñcitvā niraggikokāsaṁ pavisitvā tattha paramasukhaṁ labheyya;
mil6.3.11:4.2_2: so yoniso manasikārena byapagatatividhaggisantāpaṁ paramasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.11:4.3_0: Yathā, mahārāja, aggi, evaṁ tividhaggi daṭṭhabbo;
mil6.3.11:4.4_0: yathā aggigato puriso, evaṁ sammāpaṭipanno daṭṭhabbo;
mil6.3.11:5.1_2: tato muñcitvā nikkuṇapokāsaṁ pavisitvā tattha paramasukhaṁ labheyya;
mil6.3.11:5.2_2: so yoniso manasikārena byapagatakilesakuṇapaṁ paramasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.11:5.3_0: Yathā, mahārāja, kuṇapaṁ, evaṁ pañca kāmaguṇā daṭṭhabbā;
mil6.3.11:5.4_0: yathā kuṇapagato puriso, evaṁ sammāpaṭipanno daṭṭhabbo;
mil6.3.11:6.1_1: puriso bhīto tasito kampito viparītavibbhantacitto vāyāmena tato muñcitvā daḷhaṁ thiraṁ acalaṁ abhayaṭṭhānaṁ pavisitvā tattha paramasukhaṁ labheyya;
mil6.3.11:6.2_2: so yoniso manasikārena byapagatabhayasantāsaṁ paramasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.11:6.3_0: Yathā, mahārāja, bhayaṁ, evaṁ jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṁ paṭicca aparāparaṁ pavattabhayaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ;
mil6.3.11:6.4_0: yathā bhīto puriso, evaṁ sammāpaṭipanno daṭṭhabbo;
mil6.3.11:7.1_1: puriso kiliṭṭhamalinakalalakaddamadese patito vāyāmena taṁ kalalakaddamaṁ apavāhetvā parisuddhavimaladesamupagantvā tattha paramasukhaṁ labheyya;
mil6.3.11:7.2_2: so yoniso manasikārena byapagatakilesamalakaddamaṁ paramasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.11:7.3_0: Yathā, mahārāja, kalalaṁ, evaṁ lābhasakkārasiloko daṭṭhabbo;
mil6.3.11:7.4_0: yathā kalalagato puriso, evaṁ sammāpaṭipanno daṭṭhabbo;
mil6.3.11:8.1_0: Tañca pana nibbānaṁ sammāpaṭipanno kinti sacchikaroti?
mil6.3.11:8.2_0: Yo so, mahārāja, sammāpaṭipanno, so saṅkhārānaṁ pavattaṁ sammasati.
mil6.3.11:8.3_0: Pavattaṁ sammasamāno tattha jātiṁ passati jaraṁ passati byādhiṁ passati maraṇaṁ passati,
mil6.3.11:8.3_1: na tattha kiñci sukhaṁ sātaṁ passati āditopi majjhatopi pariyosānatopi.
mil6.3.11:8.4_0: So tattha kiñci na gayhūpagaṁ passati.
mil6.3.11:8.5_1: puriso divasasantatte ayoguḷe jalite tatte kaṭhite āditopi majjhatopi pariyosānatopi na kiñci gayhūpagaṁ padesaṁ passati;
mil6.3.11:8.6_2: so pavattaṁ sammasamāno tattha jātiṁ passati jaraṁ passati byādhiṁ passati maraṇaṁ passati,
mil6.3.11:8.6_3: na tattha kiñci sukhaṁ sātaṁ passati āditopi majjhatopi pariyosānatopi.
mil6.3.11:8.7_0: So tattha na kiñci gayhūpagaṁ passati,
mil6.3.11:8.7_1: tassa gayhūpagaṁ apassantassa citte arati saṇṭhāti,
mil6.3.11:8.7_3: so atāṇo asaraṇo asaraṇībhūto bhavesu nibbindati.
mil6.3.11:9.1_2: so tattha atāṇo asaraṇo asaraṇībhūto aggimhi nibbindeyya;
mil6.3.11:9.2_1: tassa gayhūpagaṁ apassantassa citte arati saṇṭhāti,
mil6.3.11:9.2_3: so atāṇo asaraṇo asaraṇībhūto bhavesu nibbindati.
mil6.3.11:10.1_0: Tassa pavatte bhayadassāvissa evaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati ‘santattaṁ kho panetaṁ pavattaṁ ādittaṁ sampajjalitaṁ bahudukkhaṁ bahūpāyāsaṁ,
mil6.3.11:10.1_1: yadi koci labhetha appavattaṁ etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ,
mil6.3.11:10.1_2: yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānan’ti.
mil6.3.11:10.2_0: Iti hetaṁ tassa appavatte cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati pahaṁsayati tusayati ‘paṭiladdhaṁ kho me nissaraṇan’ti.
mil6.3.11:11.1_1: puriso vippanaṭṭho videsapakkhando nibbāhanamaggaṁ disvā tattha pakkhandati pasīdati pahaṁsayati tusayati ‘paṭiladdho me nibbāhanamaggo’ti;
mil6.3.11:11.2_1: pavatte bhayadassāvissa appavatte cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati pahaṁsayati tusayati ‘paṭiladdhaṁ kho me nissaraṇan’ti.
mil6.3.11:12.1_0: So appavattatthāya maggaṁ āyūhati gavesati bhāveti bahulīkaroti,
mil6.3.11:12.1_4: tassa taṁ cittaṁ aparāparaṁ manasikaroto pavattaṁ samatikkamitvā appavattaṁ okkamati,
